ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New Player
ygData.msgSnippet: Can I answer to?  lol I am a halfling.  In Rivervale, Misty Thicket. And NO GUILD FOR ME.  Only level 3 Thanks ...
ygData.messageBody:
Can I answer to? lol
I am a halfling. In Rivervale, Misty Thicket.
And NO GUILD FOR ME. Only level 3

Thanks
--- "Nygaard, Jeff" <jeff.nygaard@...> wrote:
> What class and race are you? Where are you hunting
> right now? Are you in a
> guild yet?
>
> Answer these questions and I should be able to tell
> you where to hunt for
> exp and the best way to increase your bank account.
>
> Sistily
> 60 Gnome Warlord
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: davidgraye [SMTP:bm_dlgray@...]
> Sent: Monday, January 07, 2002 4:08 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] New Player
>
> Hello All
>
> I know I'm about 20 years late, but I'm making that
> transition from
> Ultima Online and MUD to EQ. I've been enjoying it
> so far on the
> Tribunal Server. THINGS ARE EXPENSIVE! Leveling is
> pretty balance.
> Plenty of helpful players!
>
> I'm just looking for advice on how to get more
> money. A player gave
>
> me a sweet sword does high damage, but other than
> that I'm naked.
>
> Thanks
> DLG
